title: Coping with conflict
creator_credit: Ron Tanner, David Evans and Millbank Films
brief_description: A conflict situation is dramatised within a small textile finishing works. Steps taken to resolving it are shown. A fruitful discussion starter, it presents lessons from the conflicts in the film to the audience and additional skills learned along the way.
creator_credit_for_label: Ron Tanner, David Evans and Millbank Films
